long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your skills in marble shooting ЁЯОп and aim to achieve three stars ЁЯМЯ in each stage.

This touch-and-shoot game ЁЯХ╣я╕П challenges you to crack the ball ЁЯО▒ before it sinks.
Experience the classic thrill of this beloved game, now available for you to play.
Tap the part of the screen where you want to fire your shot ЁЯФл.
Align 3 or more identical balls ЁЯФ╡ЁЯФ╡ЁЯФ╡ to eliminate them. Clear all the spheres on the path before they hit the end.
Execute more ball combos and sequential shots for top scores ЁЯПЖ.
In the traditional Frosty Frenzy Game тЭДя╕П, fun and excitement await!

The goal of the game is to match three or more balls of the same color to remove them before they reach the end ЁЯОп.

Playing instructions:

Match three or more marbles of the same kind to remove them.
Score higher by creating explosive marble combinations ЁЯТе.
